column.name: breed
column.Comment: 品种（如：金毛寻回犬、英国短毛猫）

column.name: notes
column.Comment: 特别记录、健康情况等备注

column.name: tag
column.Comment: 商品标签(热销/新品/推荐等)

column.name: care_category
column.StoredType: enum('局部护理', '深度护理', '精致修剪', '赠送护理')|0e
